reviews.title: Really bad update
reviews.comment: Guys this is one is so bad that even the charts don\'t show the last digit. They have also taken out the header which was so handy to navigate in its previous version. Really poor app. Wish had the option to give negative stars as this one truely deserves it.
reviews.author: Sankalp Sharma

reviews.title: Need further improvement.
reviews.comment: MA should b in different colors. Gd to have a 4h chart option. Can have a crosshair to click on previous bar n highlight their prices?
reviews.author: Dylan Yap

reviews.title: Very slow - massive lag - Worst Ever Mobile Trading Platform
reviews.comment: Never ever ever ever trade live with this platform. This platform is so slow, jumpy and a massive amount of lag. Do not use to trade at all. It is the worst platform I have ever used. Even slow markets can move 10 or more pips before it shows on this platform.
reviews.author: Samuel Lucas

reviews.title: Poor charting tools
reviews.comment: Need to see all digits on chart as well as be able to see at least 3 time frames at once...come on guys fix this.. 3* out of sympathy
reviews.author: Mahmud Miah

reviews.title: Decimal deviation
reviews.comment: Hello GFT. I like the trading style of Mr Neal Gikbert. Braving the rapids, problem is I can not set the deviation for a decimal (deviation: 0.2). Can you do something about it? Thank you
reviews.author: shikamaru nara

reviews.title: bad
reviews.comment: updated even bad to view

reviews.title: Way better than before
reviews.comment: Good

reviews.title: Worst Forex Platform
reviews.comment: This is the worst platform even has in the market. Only one indicator can be used. Password cannot save like iPhone. Cannot see indicator values. So bad. Why can\'t improve?
reviews.author: Germany Tan

reviews.comment: This is the worst app for trading. Keep crushing. Waste of time

reviews.comment: The apps in iOs is far much better than android...

reviews.comment: The Best FX Trading Platform

reviews.title: Poor mobile app
reviews.comment: Only one indicator can be used at a time. Small choice of indicators. Counter intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be a lot better
reviews.comment: Small non expandable Chart. Not enough timescales. Ability to add 2 moving averages would be a start.
reviews.author: John Harrison

reviews.comment: GFT\'s DeakBook app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Work!
reviews.comment: This app designed very well. Most of the trade features are included. Live Quotes, as its dealbook. No issues detected yet. Nice Work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally its here
reviews.comment: been waiting for this apps for so long. anyway there are more rooms for improvement. lots of missing indicators from selection, doesnt allow us to save password, cannot view history trade records. a plus point to this apps is the trade alert, very useful function which prompt me whenever the trade is triggered. Shall wait for more updates. kudos!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to login
reviews.comment: Guys, i m unable to log in even after installing twice. I am using a Samsung Galaxy SII running on Android version 2.4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more features
reviews.comment: Great start, needs ability to resize charts as indicators are sometimes difficult to read, finer grained timeframe selection for charts (4h especially), otherwise excellent job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Long time waiting
reviews.comment: Great guys! Few comments : 1)missing possibility to save username/password at login 2) possibility to add more indicators on the chart and not just only one 3) if you can add few main tools like : fibo retracement, trend lines you will become the best :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Well done guys !
reviews.author: A Google User
